Summary: 2 white sphere's floating/drifting/flying in flight pattern of McCarren airport las vegas
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were 2 other sightings in Las Vegas on or around May 31st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at the pool at Tuscany Suites on flamingo rd las vegas,nv i was just watching the sky,there is alot of activity in the skies above las vegas like constant helicopters and flights coming and going from McCarren airport.it was 1:05pm when i was looking north i noticed a white sphere floating high in the sky at first it wasnt moving then started to drift slowly and changing direction which leads me to believe it wasnt being blown by the wind. i was watching it for several minutes and then another came into view. both were traveling from west to east and made zig-zag pattern thru the sky. then they faded away until i couldnt see them anymore. they were in the flight pattern of planes departing the airport they appeared right after a plane flew through the airspace and disapeared before the next plane entered the airspace. planes were flying in that pattern every ten minutes or so. they looked alot like floating white orbs.
